Events.Text: Hello? I would like to make a reservation please.
You remember that your friend recommended the Hilton Hotel. Tell the assistant you've changed your mind and want to stay at Hilton Hotel. [instruction 1 of 5]
Sure, what is your name?
May I have your name, please?
Sure. My name is John.
Which hotel would you like to stay at?
What hotel would you like to stay at?
Well I was going to stay at The Shadyside Inn, but I've changed my mind. I'd like to stay at the Hilton Hotel instead.

Actually, you recall that your friend stayed at Hilton Hotel in another town. However you've read on a blog that the Old Town Inn is by long and far the most authentic one. Tell the assistant you've changed your mind and want to stay at Old Town Inn. [instruction 2 of 5]
What date would you like your stay to start?
When are you arriving?
Actually, I would love to stay at the Old Town inn instead of the Hilton hotel.
Talk to the assistant about this great travel blog that you rely on and that its never let you down on your journeys. Be creative! [instruction 3 of 5]
when are you arriving?
When are you arriving?
I am arriving May 11th. I saw an article about this lovely destination back a few years ago in the travel blog, FoodiesTravel. I absolutely rely on this for all my journeys now.

You just received a text from your partner saying: 'Hey, my brother invited us to his wedding in London on the 23rd and I already booked us a flight for the 11th!' Tell the assistant you would like to change your reservation to 10th-24th the following month. [instruction 4 of 5]
when are you leaving?
When will you be leaving again?
Actually I just got invited to a wedding, can I change the reservations please? I need to arrive on 10th and leave on 24th of June.

Tell the assistant you don't really want to go to London because your partner's brother is a bit of a show-off, but obviously you'll be going to the wedding. Finish the booking and bring the conversation to an end. [instruction 5 of 5]
i'm sorry reseration failed
I'm sorry, but your booking request failed.
Why is that? I have to have these dates... I just got invited to this wedding and It's in London. I mean I don't really want to go, but my wife is making me. It
I'm sorry booking request failed
I'm sorry, but your booking request failed.
this wedding, is for my brother in law but he's a huge show off.. but I gotta go to the wedding I guess. Isn't there anything else you can do for me here?
I'm sorry your booking request failed
I'm sorry, but your booking request failed.
Well thanks anyways. Goodbye.
thank you goodbye
Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Make a reservation at Shadyside Inn from May 11th to 23rd. Your name is John. Please request a balcony. It is ok if the room is not available - just say goodbye in this case.
Scenario.WizardTask: Help the user reserve a hotel room. (You can find the video tutorial under https://youtu.be/USrWF1ZyNWw, in case you want to watch it again.)

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant reserve your hotel?
Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
